titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1911) to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish interest rates for new loans made on or after July 1, 2013, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-89, by Ms. Foxx.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1911 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 28.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 232.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 195 (Roll no. 180).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 193 (Roll no. 181).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/22/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1911) to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish interest rates for new loans made on or after July 1, 2013.
